amendment.description: An amendment numbered 46 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to take land into trust as part of the reservation of the Lytton Rancheria.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Huffman.
